shortBio.sentence: I've worked professionally as a web developer since {webDevFirstYear}. I think it's safe to say that most people are aware of how incredibly fast-paced the technology industry is, and my experience has been that it's a humbling reminder of how quickly time passes as well; it never ceases to amaze me how much I've learned and how many problems I've solved in the past {webDevTotalYears} years. I describe myself as a technical individual with a creative streak, someone who enjoys adapting things to work in ways that their creators did not originally intend.
